Title: Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1974 Quartz Rectangular Dial DGB00007/21
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1974 Quartz Rectangular Dial DGB00007/21 RRP £575.00 Now £325.00 Description A sleek design, this men’s Dreyfuss & Co. 1974 Quartz watch is suitable for both everyday wear and formal occasions. Crafted in stainless steel, the watch features an expander bracelet strap, fastened with a push button clasp. The rectangular watch case has a fixed bezel, framing the white rectangular dial, which is textured with a diamond-shape pattern. Roman numerals mark the surrounding hours, with a square date window positioned at the three o’clock position. A subdial is located at the six o’clock position, clearly showing the seconds as they pass. Deep blue watch hands create a contrast against the dial, with a clear minute track surrounding the hour markers. The dial is protected by a layer of strong sapphire crystal glass. Powered by a Quartz movement, this Swiss-made watch is guaranteed to meet the Dreyfuss & Co. Seafarer Standard of waterproofing. This means this watch can be worn during water sports and other water activities. Chapelle are proud to be authorised stockists of Dreyfuss & Co. watches, and this watch will be sent in official Dreyfuss & Co. presentation packaging, to store your precious timepiece when not being worn. Chapelle reference: 08460040 Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP.
